name: azure-agentic-infraops
description: Agentic InfraOps - Azure infrastructure engineered by agents. Verified. Well-Architected. Deployable.

scripts.lint:cost-estimate-templates: echo '⚠️  Merged into lint:artifact-templates' && node scripts/validate-artifact-templates.mjs
scripts.lint:prose: vale --config .vale.ini docs/ .github/ README.md || echo 'Vale not installed - run: brew install vale'
scripts.lint:json: find . -name '*.json' ! -path './node_modules/*' ! -path './infra/*' ! -path './.devcontainer/*' ! -path './.vscode/*' ! -path './scripts/workflow-generator/node_modules/*' -exec sh -c 'node -e "JSON.parse(require(\"fs\").readFileSync(\"{}\")); console.log(\"✓ {}\")" 2>&1 || echo "✗ {} - Invalid JSON"' \;
scripts.lint:yaml: find . \( -name '*.yml' -o -name '*.yaml' \) ! -path './node_modules/*' ! -path './infra/*' -exec yamllint -c .yamllint.yml {} \; 2>/dev/null || echo 'yamllint not installed - run: pip install yamllint'
scripts.validate:agents: npm run lint:agent-frontmatter && npm run lint:skills-format
scripts.test:1109: npm run validate:vscode && npm run validate:agents && echo '✅ VS Code 1.109 validation passed'
scripts.validate:all: npm run lint:md && npm run lint:links:docs && npm run lint:artifact-templates && npm run lint:h2-sync && npm run lint:version-sync && npm run lint:deprecated-refs && npm run lint:mcp-config && npm run lint:agent-frontmatter && npm run lint:skills-format && npm run lint:instruction-frontmatter && npm run lint:json && echo '✅ All validations passed'

author: Jonathan Vella
